title: Question:
author: EddieMurray
content: When trying to buy spare parts for Canaan/Avalon miners like fans, power supplies, etc., it seems that there are no distributors with stock in the USA.Is anyone aware of such a distributor? Many thanks, Eddie

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.created_time: November 22, 2023, 01:12:58 AMLast edit: November 22, 2023, 01:29:17 AM by philipma1957
comments.body: yes wait for linkshttps://shop.canaan.io/collections/usahttps://altairtech.io/product-category/parts/canaan-parts/looking for moreall I have at the momentpretty sure links below are overseas https://shop.canaan.io/collections/spare-partshttps://thanosmining.com/collections/avalon-psu . ... not sure how good these guys arefound ebay links claim to be USA zero idea if good.https://www.ebay.com/itm/175885378108?https://www.ebay.com/itm/394859691576?https://www.ebay.com/itm/394348484978?

comments.author: EastCoastASICRepair
comments.body: We have many spare Avalon accessories available in the USA! You can find them on our site or contact us on telegram
